arguments.template:
<differentiate-tree 
    class="root" 
    level="0" 
    side="left-side" 
    (onhover)="onhover($event)"
    [children]="leftSide"></differentiate-tree>
<differentiate-tree 
    class="root" 
    level="0" 
    side="right-side" 
    [showActionButton]="allowRevert" 
    (onhover)="onhover($event)"
    (onrevert)="revert($event)"
    [children]="rightSide"></differentiate-tree>
• ⎌
